main event: Mr. William Cunningham observed a bright, egg-shaped object moving slowly through the sky in Burlison, Tennessee on August 7, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 8:20 PM and was visible for about 10 minutes., The object was about 1500 feet in altitude and 50 feet in diameter., The color of the object was bright orangish-white., The object changed course several times during the observation., No sound was reported during the sighting.
witness description: Mr. William Cunningham, a resident of Route 2, Burlison
